actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To require that the United States Postal Service prescribe regulations under which the National League of Families POW/MIA flag may be displayed at facilities under the control of the United States Postal Service.

summary.text: Requires the U.S. Postal Service to prescribe regulations under which the National League of Families POW/MIA flag may be displayed at its facilities.

titles.title: To require that the United States Postal Service prescribe regulations under which the National League of Families POW/MIA flag may be displayed at facilities under the control of the United States Postal Service.
